definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: This is the skater's version of Ballroom Dancing.
sentences.chinese: 此項目是冰上的交際舞表演比賽。

sentences.english: Sorry, I am engaged for the social dance.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，這交際舞我有約在先了。

sentences.english: Nowadays in Canada and in America, ballroom dancing is a very popular hobby.
sentences.chinese: 現在在加拿大和美國交際舞是真流行的愛好。

sentences.english: Learn how to do footwork for the Rumba in ballroom dancing in this free instructional dance video.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在交際舞步法在這個自由的教學視頻倫巴舞。
